subject: Baseball
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: For years, the Mets shuffled Kirk Nieuwenhuis between the majors and minors. But with Michael Cuddyer and Juan Lagares struggling, the team may rely on Nieuwenhuis much more in the second half of the season.
snippet: For years, the Mets shuffled Kirk Nieuwenhuis between the majors and minors. But with Michael Cuddyer and Juan Lagares struggling, the team may rely on Nieuwenhuis much more in the second half of the season.
